channel.title: Npc handler! pi please help
channel.description:
hey guys, currently when i kill and npc it doesn't die properly? it like stays on the ground and takes ages to respawn and when it does it's not like it respawns it just stays there. e.g if i walked around before it wont after that and you cannot attack it. it's with every npc, i even did ::npcreset and same thing. i killed a man and it came back and also was unattackable but i was able to thieve from it.
please guys i have tryed alot of things. maybe would i be able to get a new npc.java file? or npchandler file?
please help i have msn if someone can help

item.title: Npc handler! pi please help
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guys,
currently when i kill and npc it doesn’t die properly? it like stays on the ground and takes ages to respawn and when it does it’s not like it respawns it just stays there.
e.g if i walked around before it wont after that and you cannot attack it.

please guys i have tryed alot of things.
